foo_extension.tag-a: Tag becomes key/value pair. tag name becomes key, content becomes value.

tag-b.attribute-a: Attribute becomes key/value pair. Attribute name becomes key, attribute value becomes value.

foo_extension.tag-e: tag-e 1: tags with same name get merged
tag-e 2: tags with same name get merged

tag-f.tag-g: tag-g 1: attribute is merged with tag with the same name.
tag-g 2: tag is merged with attribute of the same name.
